CHAT.comment: This file is the third of a series of four (48a to 48d) for the same session.
Room next to the classroom where the children have their afternoon nap. A table and chairs are added for our sessions.

u.a: handing a blue piece to William .
William throws the piece to Nina .
Nina thinks that because she has the blue tree all the blue pieces are for her .
taking the piece from Matteo who had picked it up from the floor .
to William who has picked the dice up from the floor .
but William throws the dice all the same .
handing another blue piece to William .
putting the blue piece back into the box .
handing the box to Matteo so that he takes the right piece .
picking his piece up from the floor .
to Matteo who is showing the dice to me .
throwing the dice on the table .
taking another green piece from the box .
taking a piece from the box .
Lucien has taken an additional piece for his tree so Matteo decides to take it away .
so Lucien does the same with Matteo's tree .
inserting pieces of different colours in Nina's tree .
